OpenShift Ops

The principal purpose of the OpenShift Ops Special Interest Group is to collaborate and share information around best practices for operating and maintaining large scale OpenShift environments.

  • Home
  • /
  • OpenShift Ops

Join the OpenShift Operations
Special Interest Group

    OpenShift Ops Commons Briefing
  1. By: Adam Miller
  2. V3 Commons

    3. OpenShift's Adam Miller walks us through how OpenShift does Operations.

    Topics Covered

    • Monitoring
    • Deployment
    • Architecture

    About OpenShift Operations

    OpenShift is as much about operations as it is about development. This Special Interest Group is way for like-minded engineers to discuss and share information on deploying and maintaining OpenShift at scale.
